definition: G8 (group of eight major industrialized nations)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Japan is hosting the meeting of delegates from the so-called G8, or group of eight industrialized nations.
sentences.chinese: 日本主持了八国集团代表会议。

sentences.english: Is it really the case that the G8 is prepared to admit to its own stinginess?
sentences.chinese: 八国集团这一次真的要承认自己吝啬了？

sentences.english: The influences of Group of Eight (G8) upon international legal order have been enlarged boundlessly.
sentences.chinese: 八国集团对国际法律秩序的作用和影响，无远弗届。

sentences.english: They should be more prominent on the G8 platform.
sentences.chinese: 他们应该在西方八国集团的平台上更加突出。

sentences.english: Would you comment on the possibility of China's joining of G-8?
sentences.chinese: 请您谈一谈中国加入西方八国集团的可能性。

sentences.english: Recently the G8 encouraged patent-holders to participate in the Medicines Patent Pool.
sentences.chinese: 最近，八国集团鼓励专利持有者参与药物专利池。

sentences.english: Eight rules for driving on the German Autobahn .
sentences.chinese: 八国集团规则驾驶德国高速公路。

sentences.english: This critical problem illustrates the interface of the G8 themes.
sentences.chinese: 这一重要问题说明了八国集团会议主题的相关性。

sentences.english: France holds the G8 and G20 presidencies this year.
sentences.chinese: 法国是今年八国集团和20国集团的轮值主席。

sentences.english: The G8 has the leverage and the clout to shape these decisions.
sentences.chinese: 八国集团有影响这些决定的手段和力量。

definition: G7, the group of 7 industrialized countries: US, Japan, Britain, Germany, France, Italy and Canada (now G8, including Russia)

pinyin: Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1
Ya4 Tai4 Jing1 ji4 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: GATT, the 1995 General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade
abbr. for 歐洲共同體|欧洲共同体, European Community (old term for the EU, European Union)

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: European Community, old term for EU, European Union 歐盟|欧盟[Ou1 meng2]
permanent member state (of UN Security Council)
Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE), abbr. for 歐洲安全與合作組織|欧洲安全与合作组织[Ou1 zhou1 An1 quan2 yu3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1]
